mapper.select: select show_code, show_name, show_type, total_time, start_time, show_startdate, show_enddate, show_image_path, performance.facilities_no, total_floor, zone_cnt, total_seatCnt, facilities_name, seat_category from performance left join facilities on performance.facilities_no = facilities.facilities_no where show_name = #{showName}

select min(show_startdate) as show_startdate, max(show_startdate) as show_enddate, show_code, show_name, show_type, total_time, start_time, show_image_path, facilities_no, seat_category from performance where show_name = #{showName}
